确定删除所选的日志分组及其子分组？此操作无法撤销！: Are you sure you want to delete the selected log group and its subgroups? This action is irreversible!
请选择要操作的节点！: Please select the node to be operated on!
子分组将继承其所属父分组的分组定义。: Subgroup inherits the grouping definition of the parent group to which it belongs.
分组定义分为常规和高级2种模式，常规模式下，您可以通过选择来源主机、日志类型和日: The grouping definition is divided into two modes: General and Advanced. In General mode, you can filter the log groups by selecting a combination of the three field values of the source host, the log type, and the log label; in Advanced mode, you can filter the log groups by using search syntax.

当前按（常规/高级）模式下设置的分组定义保存日志分组。: Save the log grouping by the grouping definitions that are set up in (General/Advanced) mode.
